contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 2015 D British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Arabian Nights Winter Gardens (Opera House Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Best Instrumentalist: Brett Baker (Trombone), Woodfalls April 26, 2014, 7:10 p.m. May 16, 2016, 8:27 a.m. 1 Rothwell Temperance Band David Roberts 2 Woodfalls Band Robert Childs 3 Whitburn Band Nicholas Childs 4 The GUS Band Adam Cooke 5 Reg Vardy Band Russell Gray 6 Marsden Silver Prize Band Glyn Williams 7 Northop Band Thomas Wyss 8 Camborne Town Band John Berryman 9 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Mark Peacock 10 City of Hull Band Alan Morrison 11 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Christopher Bond 12 Mount Charles Brass Band David Stowell 13 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Kevin Gibbs 14 Burry Port Town Nigel Seaman 15 Wingates Band Paul Andrews 16 Aldbourne Band Jonathan Pippen 17 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst 18 Redbridge Brass Alan Duguid 19 Thoresby Colliery Ian McElligott 20 Kingdom Brass Eoin Tonner
